member.summary: Creates a pixel from a System.Drawing color.

member.summary: Creates a pixel from integer RGB values.

member.summary: Creates a pixel from ARGB values.

member.summary: Creates a pixel from RGB values.

member.summary: Creates a pixel from ARGB values.

member.summary: Creates a pixel from HSL-A values.

member.summary: Creates a pixel from HSL values.

member.name: F:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.A
member.summary: The alpha value of the Pixel from 0 to 255.

member.name: F:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.R
member.summary: The red value of the Pixel from 0 to 255.

member.name: F:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.G
member.summary: The green value of the Pixel from 0 to 255.

member.name: F:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.B
member.summary: The blue value of the Pixel from 0 to 255.

member.name: M:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.op_Addition(PixelMapSharp.Pixel,PixelMapSharp.Pixel)
member.summary: Additive mix of two pixels.

member.name: M:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.op_Multiply(PixelMapSharp.Pixel,PixelMapSharp.Pixel)
member.summary: Multiplicative mix of two pixels.

member.name: M:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.op_Subtraction(PixelMapSharp.Pixel,PixelMapSharp.Pixel)
member.summary: Difference mix of two pixels.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.AValue
member.summary: The alpha value of the Pixel from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.RValue
member.summary: The red value of the Pixel from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.GValue
member.summary: The green value of the Pixel from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.BValue
member.summary: The blue value of the Pixel from 0 to 1.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.Hue
member.summary: The Hue value of the Pixel, radially spanning from 0 to 360 degrees.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.Saturation
member.summary: The saturation value of the Pixel.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.Lightness
member.summary: The lightness value of the Pixel.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.Pixel.Color
member.summary: The GDI color equivalent.

member.name: T:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap
member.summary: A container of mutable pixel data.

member.summary: Creates a blank PixelMap of desired width and height.

member.name: M:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap.#ctor(PixelMapSharp.PixelMap)
member.summary: Clones a PixelMap.

member.name: M:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Quickly creates a PixelMap from a file path.

member.name: M:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap.#ctor(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Quickly creates a PixelMap from a Bitmap.
member.seealso: Copies a Bitmap through slow pixel-by-pixel reads.

member.name: F:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap.Width
member.summary: The width of the PixelMap in pixels.

member.name: F:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap.Height
member.summary: The height of the PixelMap in pixels.

member.summary: Determine if a point is within this PixelMap.

member.name: M:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap.GetBitmap
member.summary: Produce a Bitmap from this PixelMap.

member.name: M:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap.SlowLoad(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Load a Bitmap pixel-by-pixel, slowly.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap.Item(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Access a Pixel of the PixelMap from its X and Y coordinates.

member.name: P:PixelMapSharp.PixelMap.Item(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Access a Pixel of the PixelMap from its X and Y coordinates contained within a Point.
